result.name: basic-skills
result.notes: Includes information on individuals who engage (via Jobcentre intervention) in any part of the basic skills process. The dataset is used to evaluate client literacy and numeracy levels. The data also includes information on the number of customers who have been screened for basic skills needs, and those who are either attending an independent assessment or starting a basic skills course.

organization.name: department-for-work-and-pensions
organization.title: Department for Work and Pensions
organization.description:
The Department for Work and Pensions (DWP) is responsible for welfare and pension policy and is a key player in tackling child poverty. It is the biggest public service delivery department in the UK and serves over 20 million customers.

DWP is a ministerial department, supported by 13 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/department-for-work-pensions

result.title: Basic Skills

extras.value: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/the-value-of-basic-skills-in-the-british-labour-market-brief    Not due to be released. Contains personal data. Will be reviewed in the light of demand and prioritisation.
